cgcloud__Promotion_Reward__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Reward__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Reward__c.description: This object stores the details of rewards that are assigned to a reward group.

cgcloud__Automatically_Granted__c.description: Defines whether the rewards must be automatically granted.

cgcloud__Boolean_Value__c.description: Value to compare with an output parameter.

cgcloud__Classification__c.description: Classification of either Free Item Reward or Special Rewards.

cgcloud__Date_Value__c.description: Value to compare with an output parameter.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Free_Item__c.description: Defines a reward as free item-relevant.

cgcloud__Hurdle__c.description: Reference to Hurdle. Indicates whether a specific hurdle condition resolution is to be done for rewards values.

cgcloud__Included__c.description: Define whether the reward is to be included on pricing calculations in the context of selectable promotion.

cgcloud__Numeric_Value__c.description: Value to compare with an output parameter.

cgcloud__Pricing_Condition_Template__c.description: Reference to the pricing condition template.

cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Group__c.description: Master-Detail to the Reward Group to which the Reward belongs.

cgcloud__Sort_Unique__c.description: Defines the uniqueness of the sort value.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sort order of the displayable rewards records.

cgcloud__SubGroup__c.description: Defines the subgroup to which the rewards belongs.

cgcloud__Text_Value__c.description: Value to compare with an output parameter.

cgcloud__Title__c.description: Localizable title of the Reward Group. Reference to the title based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__User_Exit__c.description: Defines a Reward as a Special Reward.
